description: This file defines the GeminiTools class, a Python module that provides methods to generate images and videos using the Google Gemini API, supporting both Vertex AI and Gemini modes. It manages API client creation, handles responses, and integrates with an agent to add generated media artifacts.

classes.name: GeminiTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for interacting with Google Gemini API, capable of generating images and videos based on text prompts, supporting both Vertex AI and Gemini modes.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the GeminiTools class, setting up API client with provided credentials and configuration.

methods.name: generate_image
methods.description: Generates an image from a text prompt using Google Gemini API and adds it to the agent.

methods.name: generate_video
methods.description: Generates a video from a text prompt using Google Gemini API and adds it to the agent.
